name: D/D/D Gust High King Alexander
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Gains 3000 ATK while 3 or more "D/D/D" monsters are on the field. If another "D/D" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field while you control this card (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 "D/D" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "D/D/D Gust High King Alexander" once per turn.
